verbs.description: [ARG0: White House reporters] [V: grilled] [ARG1: press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] , [ARGM-ADV: demanding answers on the morality of the Trump administration 's new practice of separating some migrant parents from their children at the border] .
